definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
nickname of American singer Bruno Mars
clash that leaves both sides shattered
lit. Martian language/fig. Internet slang used to communicate secret messages that the general public or government can't understand

sentences.english: The findings are based on detailed radar measurements of ice caps on Mars.
sentences.chinese: 這些發現是基於對火星冰冠的詳細雷達測定數據。

sentences.english: The spark plugs on modern bikes are always hard to reach.
sentences.chinese: 火星塞很不好取下，因爲放置的太深。

sentences.english: As Mars moves opposite your sign, you could feel listless and depressed about love.
sentences.chinese: 火星與你對立，你可能對愛心生怠倦和沮喪。

sentences.english: For good performance of the spark plug you need to replace it regularly.
sentences.chinese: 爲了好的性能，你應該定期更換火星塞。

sentences.english: With Mars in Leo, you'll go after your goal with earnest.
sentences.chinese: 隨着處在獅子宮的火星，你肯定能完成你的目標。

sentences.english: The newest high-end apartments on Mars are being marketed with a headphone closet.
sentences.chinese: 最新的火星高級公寓都要標榜自己有一個耳機櫃。

sentences.english: He was a member of the team that worked on the voyage of Mariner Nine to Mars.
sentences.chinese: 他是水手九號火星探測器研製小組成員。

sentences.english: Earth Commander is working on the spaceship for Mars.
sentences.chinese: 聽着，地球司令正忙着製造火星的飛船。

sentences.english: Mars, this week, edges slowly closer towards a right-angle with Jupiter.
sentences.chinese: 火星本週緩緩移近與木星成直角的位置。

sentences.english: I'm the first guy to drive long-distance on Mars.
sentences.chinese: 我是第一個在火星上開長途車的人。

sentences.english: Remember, he's a Martian and doesn't keep score the way you do.
sentences.chinese: 謹記，他是火星人，記分法和你不同。

sentences.english: In June, 1832, the spark was the death of General Lamarque.
sentences.chinese: 在一八三二年六月，那粒火星便是拉馬克將軍之死。

sentences.english: Martians pride themseles in doing things all by themseles.
sentences.chinese: 火星人以自力做事爲榮。

sentences.english: Aries are charged with the warrior traits of Mars.
sentences.chinese: 牡羊座帶着火星的戰神性格。

sentences.english: This image shows the Mars-sized planetoid approaching proto -Earth.
sentences.chinese: 該圖顯示的是一火星般大小的行星正在接近原始地球。

sentences.english: Try comparing its brightness and color to that of reddish Mars.
sentences.chinese: 試着與淡紅色的火星比較一下明亮度和顏色。

definition: gold star/stars (that one sees from blow to the head etc)
asteroid belt between Mars and Jupiter
to shoot (a projectile)/to fire (a rocket)/to launch/to emit (a particle)/to discharge/emanation/emission
